summary: This bill, the SOAR Act Improvements Act, amends the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act to enhance the school choice scholarship program in Washington, D.C. Key changes include extending grant durations, modifying application requirements, clarifying accreditation standards, expanding the use of funds for pre-kindergarten and student academic assistance, adjusting standardized testing requirements, modifying evaluation procedures, and altering reporting requirements for entities receiving funds. It also extends the authorization of appropriations for the program.
